plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: An incorrect PIN has been entered. You have %d attempts left.
An incorrect PIN has been entered. If an incorrect PIN is entered %d more times, you will have to contact your service provider to unlock your device.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: An incorrect PUK has been entered. If an incorrect PUK is entered %d more times, the SIM card will be permanently locked.
An incorrect PUK has been entered. If an incorrect PUK is entered %d more times, the SIM card will be permanently locked.
